description: Try this recipe for golden baked potatoes served with a veggie-packed tomato sauce. It's nutritionally approved and is the perfect kid-friendly snack.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Zucchini,Halal,Microwave,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smashed potatoes with veggie tomato sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup continental parsley leaves, finely chopped (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Cook potatoes in microwave according to packet instructions.
Transfer potatoes to tray. Lightly crush with a fork. Spray with oil. Season with pepper. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, add tomato paste, carrot, zucchini and tomatoes to a small saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until vegetables have softened. Season with pepper. Transfer to a small blender or food processor, then blitz for 10 seconds or until smooth. Serve with smashed potatoes sprinkled with parsley.
